ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently this candidate is employed as a Sr. QA Engineer/American Student at Eclipse. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Java, XML, SQL, Regression Testing, Jboss, JUnit, Mercury Interactive TestDirector, Mercury Interactive Quicktest, Client/Server, UNIX, Korn Shell, JIRA, C++, Agile Methodology, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle, Microsoft Team Foundation Server, Mercury Interactive WinRunner, JavaScript, HTML, TOAD, Scrum Methodology, SED, Mercury Quality Center, Manual Testing, C Programming Language, Bugzilla, Struts Web Application Framework, Oracle 10G, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft .NET Technology, Linux, Java Server Pages, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, HTTP, GUI Applications, Enterprise Java Beans, ECLiPSe, Black-Box Testing, Automatic Testing, AWK, VMware, SOAP, SELECT methodology, SAN, REST, Oracle Payroll, Oracle 8i, Nexus Technology, Network Attached Storage, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, JDK, IBM HTTP Server, Eclipse Indigo, CVS, Apple Mac, Apache Maven. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
